title: Ultimate Material Tiling System
description: Auto-Tiler is a material function that will change the tiling of a texture dynamically based on the world scale of a mesh, it also supports things like panner and other UV functions.
longDescription:
IMPORTANT: If you run into any issues or need help please reach out to me first or use the questions tab. The reviews section is not for troubleshooting. Products are tested by Epic Games and myself to be fully functional before publishing.



Need Support: Discord

Documentation: Written Documentation


Need something custom? Hire Us: https://www.komodobitgames.com/services


Video Example 1: https://youtu.be/k3v9qJvdgCo

Video Example 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eLU1QYmjTg8


With Auto-Tiler you can have every material in your level dynamically and automatically adjust its tiling based on the mesh world scale. You won't need to use tricks like world aligned textures or trying to manually line up the tiling, the material function will automatically detect the new scale of the mesh and auto adjust the texture to properly fit it.


The scaling is infinite in size, so you can make a mesh as big or as small as you want and auto-tiler will figure out the right tiling amount for you. Since this is a material function you can add it to any material in your project, you don't need to rely on the demo ones in this asset pack making it project agnostic.



If the plugin works well for you then please be sure to leave a review letting us know what you liked about it.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Auto Tile your materials based on the current scale of the mesh it is applied to.
  • Make level design extremely quick and easy, this tech is used in AAA games where you might see it used on mountains or other reused assets that get scaled up and down alot.
  • Very easy to use, should take no more than 2-3 minutes to get it setup and working in your level(may vary depending on how many materials you need to add it to).
  • Cheaper on performance and more versatile than world aligned textures.
  • Supports any other material function that uses UVs such as panner, rotator, or any other ones.

Number of Unique Materials and Material Instances: 1 Unqiue Parent Material, 4 Material instances, and 1 material function.

Number of Textures: 20(Just for Demo Content, You can use your own)

Texture Resolutions: 2048x2048(Demo Content only, works with any texture you have of any resolution)

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Link

Important/Additional Notes:

releaseInfo.releaseNote: The textures used in the demo content were made by me in material maker and Materialize to convert the albedo to PBR.
